item.title: Hack The Box
item.description: HackTheBox - More sharpening of skills, but with challenges to test a particular area as well such as RE, crypto etc.

item.title: Root Me
item.description: Root-Me - Wargaming and challenges to practice a wide range of skills

item.title: Vulnhub
item.description: VulnHub - To support my PWK/OSCP course and generally sharpen those offensive security skills I have been working through some of the machines on here.

item.title: Over The Wire
item.description: OverTheWire Wargaming site to practice exploitation skills

item.title: Coming Soon
item.description: Its always better to give rather than receive, so as time allows I will be writing some tutorials on various topics.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Chris. I am a Hacker, Engineer and Geek. I have a passion for all things Cyber Security, but my main areas of interest are in Purple teaming and the Cloud. You can never know everything, but knowledge is power; so I always strive to learn something new as often as family, life and work allow. I am also a motorcyclist and boulderer when not chasing around after 2 kids and my darling wife.

item.title: My Study List
item.description: The home of my collected learning; past, present and future. Here I document the courses & certifications, blogs, books and other resources I have used since I got onto the Cyber Security path Courses (upcoming and in Progress) Certified Kubernetes Adminstrator - Time to learn how to use this tech properly before I can secure it. Completed Sites Pentester Academy - Always striving to improve my skills, I am using the content here to supplement my other training.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Pages Just some links to pages I have found useful across the internet.
